title: Track Awesome Captcha Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Captcha (ZYSzys/awesome-captcha) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: :key: Curated list of awesome captcha libraries and crack tools.

items.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Oct 04, 2023
items.content_text:
### Libraries

*   [patchca](https://code.google.com/archive/p/patchca) - Simple yet powerful CAPTCHA library written in Java.
items.content_html:
Libraries

  • patchca - Simple yet powerful CAPTCHA library written in Java.

items.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Nov 30, 2021
items.content_text:
### Generation

items.content_html:
Generation

items.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on May 17, 2020
items.content_text:
### Generation

*   [koto-bank/kocaptcha (‚≠ê58)](https://github.com/koto-bank/kocaptcha) - A simple captcha service with a single API endpoint, written in Rust.
*   [Captcheck](https://captcheck.netsyms.com) - Lightweight, self-hostable CAPTCHA service written in PHP 7 and MySQL. Uses a selection of icons from Font-Awesome. Text-only accessibility mode and support for keyboard-only operation.
*   [Securimage](https://www.phpcaptcha.org) - Open-source free PHP Captcha script.
*   [Lokno/click-captcha (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/Lokno/click-captcha) - A visual, click-based CAPTCHA for human authentication.
*   [ArgoZhang/SliderCaptcha (‚≠ê286)](https://github.com/ArgoZhang/SliderCaptcha) - Slider captcha supporting mobile.

### Other / Chinese

*   [Hashcash for PHP/JavaScript forms (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/007/hashcash-js) - An alternative to captcha to fight spam, based on proof-of-work.
items.content_html:
Generation

  • koto-bank/kocaptcha (‚≠ê58) - A simple captcha service with a single API endpoint, written in Rust.
  • Captcheck - Lightweight, self-hostable CAPTCHA service written in PHP 7 and MySQL. Uses a selection of icons from Font-Awesome. Text-only accessibility mode and support for keyboard-only operation.
  • Securimage - Open-source free PHP Captcha script.
  • Lokno/click-captcha (‚≠ê1) - A visual, click-based CAPTCHA for human authentication.
  • ArgoZhang/SliderCaptcha (‚≠ê286) - Slider captcha supporting mobile.

Other / Chinese

  • Hashcash for PHP/JavaScript forms (‚≠ê56) - An alternative to captcha to fight spam, based on proof-of-work.

items.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Feb 22, 2019

### Crack / General

*   [kerlomz/captcha\_trainer (‚≠ê3.1k)](https://github.com/kerlomz/captcha_trainer) - Based on CNN5/DenseNet+BLSTM/LSTM+CTC to realize verification code identification. Only for training the model.
items.content_html:
Crack / General

  • kerlomz/captcha_trainer (‚≠ê3.1k) - Based on CNN5/DenseNet+BLSTM/LSTM+CTC to realize verification code identification. Only for training the model.

items.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Dec 07, 2018
items.content_text:
### Crack / General

*   [arunpatala/captcha (‚≠ê181)](https://github.com/arunpatala/captcha) - Breaking captchas using torch.
*   [zakizhou/CAPTCHA (‚≠ê68)](https://github.com/zakizhou/CAPTCHA) - Implement classification for CAPTCHA in TensorFlow.
*   [nladuo/captcha-break (‚≠ê732)](https://github.com/nladuo/captcha-break) - Captcha break based on opencv2, tesseract-ocr and some machine learning algorithm.
*   [ypwhs/captcha\_break (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/ypwhs/captcha_break) - Captcha break using CNN with Keras.
*   [ptigas/simple-captcha-solver (‚≠ê575)](https://github.com/ptigas/simple-captcha-solver) - Simple CAPTCHA solver in python üêç.
*   [rickyhan/SimGAN-Captcha (‚≠ê436)](https://github.com/rickyhan/SimGAN-Captcha) - Solve captcha without manually labeling a training set.
*   [arunpatala/captcha.irctc (‚≠ê213)](https://github.com/arunpatala/captcha.irctc) - Reading irctc captchas with 98% accuracy using deep learning.
*   [JackonYang/captcha-tensorflow (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/JackonYang/captcha-tensorflow) - Image Captcha Solving Using TensorFlow and CNN Model.
*   [skyduy/CNN\_keras (‚≠ê293)](https://github.com/skyduy/CNN_keras) - CNN | Keras | CAPTCHA recognitionÔºàÂç∑ÁßØÁ•ûÁªèÁΩëÁªú„ÄÅKerasÊ°ÜÊû∂„ÄÅÈ™åËØÅÁ†ÅËØÜÂà´Ôºâ.
*   [PatrickLib/captcha\_recognize (‚≠ê568)](https://github.com/PatrickLib/captcha_recognize) - Image Recognition captcha without image segmentation.
*   [zhengwh/captcha-svm (‚≠ê207)](https://github.com/zhengwh/captcha-svm) - Use svm to hack simple captcha.
*   [chxj1992/captcha\_cracker (‚≠ê198)](https://github.com/chxj1992/captcha_cracker) - Crack captcha with CNN.
*   [chxj1992/slide\_captcha\_cracker (‚≠ê144)](https://github.com/chxj1992/slide_captcha_cracker) - Crack solution for slide captcha with Canny algorithm.
*   [JasonLiTW/simple-railway-captcha-solver#english-version (‚≠ê818)](https://github.com/JasonLiTW/simple-railway-captcha-solver#english-version) - Simple captcha solver based on CNN and a training set generator by imitating the style of captcha.
*   [lllcho/CAPTCHA-breaking (‚≠ê223)](https://github.com/lllcho/CAPTCHA-breaking) - Breaking the captcha.

### Crack / Chinese

*   [burness/chinese\_hand\_write\_rec (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/burness/tensorflow-101/tree/master/chinese_hand_write_rec/src) - Handwritten chinese recognition.
*   [taosir/cnn\_handwritten\_chinese\_recognition (‚≠ê538)](https://github.com/taosir/cnn_handwritten_chinese_recognition) - As the name shows, handwritten\_chinese\_recognition with cnn.
*   [soloice/Chinese-Character-Recognition (‚≠ê205)](https://github.com/soloice/Chinese-Character-Recognition) - This project shows how to use CNN to perform Chinese character recognition, a much more complicated task compared to MNIST digit recognition.
*   [muchrooms/zheye (‚≠ê800)](https://github.com/muchrooms/zheye) - Chinese captcha recognition program for handstand character of zhihu.
*   [aaronshan/12306-captcha (‚≠ê285)](https://github.com/aaronshan/12306-captcha) - Recognize 12306 captcha with deep learning.
items.content_html:

  • arunpatala/captcha (‚≠ê181) - Breaking captchas using torch.
  • zakizhou/CAPTCHA (‚≠ê68) - Implement classification for CAPTCHA in TensorFlow.

items.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Nov 23, 2018
items.content_text:
### Generation

*   [dchest/captcha (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/dchest/captcha) - Go package captcha implements generation and verification of image and audio CAPTCHAs.
*   [lepture/captcha (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/lepture/captcha) - A captcha library that generates audio and image CAPTCHAs.
*   [lemonce/svg-captcha (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/lemonce/svg-captcha) - Generate svg captcha in Node.js.
*   [DoubleSpout/ccap (‚≠ê478)](https://github.com/DoubleSpout/ccap) - Node.js generate captcha using c++ library CImg without install any other lib or software.
*   [contra/captchagen (‚≠ê184)](https://github.com/contra/captchagen) - Captcha generation for Node.js.
*   [jineshfrancs/CaptchaImageView (‚≠ê613)](https://github.com/jineshfrancs/CaptchaImageView) - Custom ImageView to generate captcha image.
*   [mcxtzhang/SwipeCaptcha (‚≠ê710)](https://github.com/mcxtzhang/SwipeCaptcha) - Swipe captcha of Android platform.
*   [mojocn/base64Captcha (‚≠ê2.3k)](https://github.com/mojocn/base64Captcha) - Golang base64-captcha supports digits, numbers,alphabet, arithmetic, audio and digit-alphabet captcha.

### Crack / Chinese

*   [nickliqian/cnn\_captcha (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/nickliqian/cnn_captcha) - Use cnn recognize captcha by tensorflow.
items.content_html:
Generation

  • dchest/captcha (‚≠ê2k) - Go package captcha implements generation and verification of image and audio CAPTCHAs.
  • lepture/captcha (‚≠ê1.1k) - A captcha library that generates audio and image CAPTCHAs.
  • lemonce/svg-captcha (‚≠ê1.9k) - Generate svg captcha in Node.js.
  • DoubleSpout/ccap (‚≠ê478) - Node.js generate captcha using c++ library CImg without install any other lib or software.
  • contra/captchagen (‚≠ê184) - Captcha generation for Node.js.
  • jineshfrancs/CaptchaImageView (‚≠ê613) - Custom ImageView to generate captcha image.
  • mcxtzhang/SwipeCaptcha (‚≠ê710) - Swipe captcha of Android platform.
  • mojocn/base64Captcha (‚≠ê2.3k) - Golang base64-captcha supports digits, numbers,alphabet, arithmetic, audio and digit-alphabet captcha.

items.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Aug 23, 2018
items.content_text:
### Libraries

*   [mewebstudio/captcha (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/mewebstudio/captcha) - Captcha for Laravel 5.
*   [CGregwar/Captcha (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/Gregwar/Captcha) - PHP Captcha library.
*   [trekjs/captcha (‚≠ê468)](https://github.com/trekjs/captcha) - A Lightweight Pure JavaScript Captcha for Node.js. No C/C++, No ImageMagick, No Canvas.
*   [google/recaptcha (‚≠ê3.5k)](https://github.com/google/recaptcha) - PHP client library for reCAPTCHA, a free service to protect your website from spam and abuse.
*   [ambethia/recaptcha (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/ambethia/recaptcha) - ReCaptcha helpers for ruby apps.
*   [anhskohbo/no-captcha (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/anhskohbo/no-captcha) - No CAPTCHA reCAPTCHA For Laravel.

### Crack / General

*   [ecthros/uncaptcha (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/ecthros/uncaptcha) - Defeating Google's audio reCaptcha with 85% accuracy.
items.content_html:
Libraries

  • mewebstudio/captcha (‚≠ê2.5k) - Captcha for Laravel 5.
  • CGregwar/Captcha (‚≠ê1.8k) - PHP Captcha library.
  • trekjs/captcha (‚≠ê468) - A Lightweight Pure JavaScript Captcha for Node.js. No C/C++, No ImageMagick, No Canvas.
  • google/recaptcha (‚≠ê3.5k) - PHP client library for reCAPTCHA, a free service to protect your website from spam and abuse.
  • ambethia/recaptcha (‚≠ê2k) - ReCaptcha helpers for ruby apps.
  • anhskohbo/no-captcha (‚≠ê1.8k) - No CAPTCHA reCAPTCHA For Laravel.

Crack / General

items.title: Awesome Captcha Updates on Jun 07, 2018
items.content_text:
### Tools / Chinese

*   [Tesseract (‚≠ê68k)](https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract) - Tesseract Open Source OCR Engine.
*   [Negative-captcha (‚≠ê787)](https://github.com/subwindow/negative-captcha) - A plugin to make the process of creating a negative captcha in Rails much less painful.
*   [Django-simple-captcha (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/mbi/django-simple-captcha) - An extremely simple, yet highly customizable Django application to add captcha images to any Django form.
*   [Securimage (‚≠ê572)](https://github.com/dapphp/securimage) - PHP CAPTCHA Script.
*   [Captcha\_solver (‚≠ê250)](https://github.com/lorien/captcha_solver) - Univeral API to captcha solving services.

### Other / Chinese

*   [VisualCaptcha (‚≠ê403)](https://github.com/emotionLoop/visualCaptcha) - A collection of all the different versions/repos of visualCaptcha.
items.content_html:
Tools / Chinese

  • Tesseract (‚≠ê68k) - Tesseract Open Source OCR Engine.
  • Negative-captcha (‚≠ê787) - A plugin to make the process of creating a negative captcha in Rails much less painful.
  • Django-simple-captcha (‚≠ê1.4k) - An extremely simple, yet highly customizable Django application to add captcha images to any Django form.
  • Securimage (‚≠ê572) - PHP CAPTCHA Script.
  • Captcha_solver (‚≠ê250) - Univeral API to captcha solving services.

Other / Chinese

  • VisualCaptcha (‚≠ê403) - A collection of all the different versions/repos of visualCaptcha.
